summary: Sometimes i remember Molly is dead, and im like ,okay, we’ve been through this, get yourself together’ and then i think that he...
body:
Sometimes i remember Molly is dead, and im like ,okay, we’ve been through this, get yourself together’ and then i think that he is not only dead but also not able to develob deeper relationships with the rest of the gang, tho there was so much place for more intimacy

And then i cant get myself together

summary: If everyone watching The Search For Grog could tag it with at least one of the common, easy-to-guess tags for this episode, that...
body: If everyone watching The Search For Grog could tag it with at least one of the common, easy-to-guess tags for this episode, that would be great. Like, you know, maybe #search for grog, or #tsfg, or #search for grog spoilers. I am already filtering 5 different tags and I still have spoilers on my dash. Pretty please?

summary:
Lieve'tel cast Beacon of Hope.
Beacon of Hope is a Life domain spell.
Lieve'tel, a servant of the Raven Queen, is a Life...
body:
Lieve'tel cast Beacon of Hope.

Beacon of Hope is a Life domain spell.

Lieve'tel, a servant of the Raven Queen, is a Life cleric.

Holy FUCK Liam O'Brien.

EDIT: nvm I got it wrong she was Grave domain, on brand

tags: sometimes i do the art thing
summary: My first Pub Draw!! I watched the second half of the stream from my desk at work, then did most of the drawing from my vague...
body:
My first Pub Draw!! I watched the second half of the stream from my desk at work, then did most of the drawing from my vague recollection of Babs’ instructions (WHAT ARE TEETH?!! omg) during Thursday’s episode, and finished the details while watching The Search for Grog on Friday. Super super super fun week.

I’m still so impressed with Sam’s final product. Digital is nice because you can do things like break lineart up between layers that don’t interfere with each other. No such luxury with pencil and paper.

reblog.comment:

summary: Travis: A dashing silver fox if I do say so myself. With robes of the finest quality. Laura: And what color are your eyes?...
body:
Travis: A dashing silver fox if I do say so myself. With robes of the finest quality.

Laura: And what color are your eyes?

Travis: Piercing Blue.

Laura: *swoon*

So Vex has a Type…
